comment._content: Typically Swiss Chalets, it must be either in Wallis or in Graubünden.

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Going through the Swiss photochromes on the LOC website, almost all of the winter pictures are from Graubünden/Grisons. In addition to the numbering, which puts them in the vicinity of the now identified images of Davos and St. Moritz (both in Graubünden), "Winter scene in Grisons, Switzerland" is likely the best description...

comment._content: reminds me of the big horn mountains in wyoming, the old cabins and the mountains too.
